data.title: Requirements for Provisional Licenses
data.excerpt: Assembly Bill 141 and Senate Bill 160 (2021) modified requirements for provisional licenses. Licensees must now meet additional criteria to renew a provisional license to ensure progress is being made toward annual licensure. Provisional licenses will sunset in stages over time. A summary of criteria and timelines related to provisional licenses is outlined in the document.
